# isItemExpanded(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a given item is expanded.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func isItemExpanded(_ item: Any?) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **item**: An item in the receiver.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if `item` is expanded, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Related Documentation

- **expandItem(_:)**: Expands a given item.

## Working with Expandability

- **isExpandable(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a given item is expandable.
